name: equivalency
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
the fact of having the same amount, value, purpose, qualities, etc.: equivalency between I don’t believe there is a moral equivalency between the two situations. The survey indicates that there is an equivalency of satisfaction between in-person and telephone appointments. Synonym
equivalenceRelated word
equivalent
More examplesFewer examplesComparing these two organizations is a false equivalency.The purpose of this study is not to demonstrate an equivalency between the two systems.This formula defines the equivalency between mass and energy.This agreement ensures some equivalency of standards in European countries.
